 29456                                  	;push	cs
 29457                                  	;pop	ds
 29458                                  
 29459                                  	xor	ah,ah			;    ax==UMB
 29460                                  	mov	bx,UmbSize		;    bx==array
 29461                                  	shl	al,1	                ;    ax==offset
 29462                                  	;add	ax,bx			;    ax==element index
 29463                                  	;mov	si,ax			; ds:si==element index
 29464                                  
 29465                                  	;lodsw				;    ax==size
 29466                                  
 29467                                  	add	bx,ax
 29468                                  	;mov	ax,[bx]
 29469                                  	mov	ax,[cs:bx]
 29470                                  
 29471                                  	;pop	ds
 29472                                  	;pop	si
 29473                                  	pop	bx
 29474                                  	retn
 29475                                  
 29476                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29477                                  ;*** StoLoadUMB - Overrides the load UMB number with what's in AL
 29478                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29479                                  ; ENTRY:   AL == new load UMB
 29480                                  ; EXIT:    None
 29481                                  ; ERROR:   None
 29482                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX
 29483                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29484                                  ; CAUTION: Should only be used if /L:... was used.  Logically, that is the only
 29485                                  ;          time you would ever need this, so that's okay.
 29486                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29487                                  
 29488                                  ;StoLoadUMB:
 29489                                  ;	;putdata UmbLoad, al
 29490                                  ;	push	es
 29491                                  ;	push	cs
 29492                                  ;	pop	es
 29493                                  ;	mov	[es:UmbLoad],al
 29494                                  ;	pop	es
 29495                                  ;	retn
 29496                                  
 29497                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29498                                  ;*** StoLoadSize - Overrides the load UMB minimum size with what's in AX
 29499                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29500                                  ; ENTRY:  AL == new load size
 29501                                  ; EXIT:   None
 29502                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29503                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29504                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29505                                  
 29506                                  StoLoadSize:
 29507                                  	push	dx
 29508                                  
 29509                                  	;getdata dl, UmbLoad		; Put UMB# in DL and size in AX
 29510                                  	;
 29511                                  	;push	ds
 29512                                  	;push	cs
 29513                                  	;pop	ds
 29514                                  	;mov	dl,[UmbLoad]
 29515                                  	;pop	ds	
 29516                                  
 29517                                  	mov	dl,[cs:UmbLoad]
 29518                                  
 29519                                  	cmp	dl,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh
 29520                                  	je	short sls10
 29521                                  
 29522                                  	call	stowSiz			; We've got a function to do just this
 29523                                  sls10:	
 29524                                  	pop	dx
 29525                                  	retn
 29526                                  
 29527                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29528                                  ;*** hideUMB - marks as HIDDEN all FREE elements in UMB passed as AL
 29529                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29530                                  ; ENTRY:    AL must indicate a valid UMB; 0==conv && is invalid.
 29531                                  ; EXIT:     None; free elements in UMB marked as hidden
 29532                                  ; ERROR:    None
 29533                                  ; USES:     Flags
 29534                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29535                                  
 29536                                  hideUMB:
 29537                                  	push	ax
 29538                                  	push	es
 29539                                  
 29540                                  	call	findUMB		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 29541                                  	jc	short huX
 29542                                  
 29543                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 29544                                  ; HU10--ES - MCB inside UMB; if it's a system MCB,
 29545                                  ;            we're not in the same UMB, so exit.
 29546                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 29547                                  
 29548                                  hu10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 29549                                  	jz	short huX	; If it is, we've finished the UMB.
 29550                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 29551                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 29552                                  	jnz	short hu20
 29553                                  
 29554                                  	call	hideMCB
 29555                                  hu20:	
 29556                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 29557                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ;'Z'
 29558                                  	jz	short huX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 29559                                  
 29560                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 29561                                  	mov     ax,es
 29562                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 29563                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29564                                  	inc     ax
 29565                                  	mov     es,ax
 29566                                  
 29567                                  	jmp	short hu10
 29568                                  huX:	
 29569                                  	pop	es
 29570                                  	pop	ax
 29571                                  	retn
 29572                                  
 29573                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29574                                  ;*** isTiny - returns with ZF set if user didn't specify /S
 29575                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29576                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 29577                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if user DIDN'T specify /S
 29578                                  ; ERROR:    None
 29579                                  ; USES:     Flags
 29580                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29581                                  
 29582                                  isTiny:
 29583                                  	push	ax
 29584                                  
 29585                                  	;getdata al, fUmbTiny
 29586                                  	;
 29587                                  	;push	ds
 29588                                  	;push	cs
 29589                                  	;pop	ds
 29590                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny]
 29591                                  	;pop	ds
 29592                                  
 29593                                  	mov	al,[cs:fUmbTiny]		
 29594                                  
 29595                                  	or	al,al
 29596                                  	pop	ax
 29597                                  	retn
 29598                                  
 29599                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29600                                  ;*** isFreeMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FREE
 29601                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29602                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 29603                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is free, else !ZF
 29604                                  ; ERROR:    None
 29605                                  ; USES:     Flags
 29606                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29607                                  
 29608                                  ;isFreeMCB:
 29609                                  ;	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 29610                                  ;	retn
 29611                                  
 29612                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29613                                  ;*** hideMCB - marks as HIDDEN the MCB at ES:0
 29614                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29615                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 29616                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as HIDDEN
 29617                                  ; ERROR:    None
 29618                                  ; USES:     None
 29619                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29620                                  
 29621                                  hideMCB:
 29622                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 29623                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0], 'HI' ; 4948h
 29624                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2], 'DD' ; 4444h
 29625                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4], 'EN' ; 4E45h
 29626                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6], '  ' ; 2020h	
 29627                                  	retn
 29628                                  
 29629                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29630                                  ;*** unHideMCB - marks as FREE the MCB at ES:0
 29631                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29632                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 29633                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as FREE
 29634                                  ; ERROR:    None
 29635                                  ; USES:     None
 29636                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29637                                  
 29638                                  unHideMCB:
 29639                                  	push	ax
 29640                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],FreePSPOwner ; 0
 29641                                  	mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 29642                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 29643                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 29644                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 29645                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 29646                                  	pop	ax
 29647                                  	retn
 29648                                  
 29649                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29650                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 29651                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 29652                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29653                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 29654                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 29655                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 29656                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 29657                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29658                                  
 29659                                  findUMB:
 29660                                  	push	ax
 29661                                  	push	cx
 29662                                  	push	dx
 29663                                  
 29664                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 29665                                  
 29666                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 29667                                  
 29668                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 29669                                  	mov	es,ax
 29670                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 29671                                  
 29672                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 29673                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 29674                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 29675                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 29676                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 29677                                  
 29678                                  fu10:	
 29679                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 29680                                  	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 29681                                  
 29682                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 29683                                  	jnz	short fu20
 29684                                  
 29685                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 29686                                  fu20:	
 29687                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 29688                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 29689                                  	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 29690                                  
 29691                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 29692                                  	mov     ax,es
 29693                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 29694                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29695                                  	inc     ax
 29696                                  	mov     es,ax
 29697                                  
 29698                                  	jmp	short fu10
 29699                                  fuE:	
 29700                                  	stc
 29701                                  fuX:
 29702                                  	pop	dx
 29703                                  	pop	cx
 29704                                  	pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 29705                                  	retn
 29706                                  
 29707                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29708                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 29709                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29710                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 29711                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 29712                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 29713                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 29714                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29715                                  
 29716                                  BigFree:
 29717                                  	push	bx
 29718                                  	push	cx
 29719                                  
 29720                                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 29721                                  	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 29722                                  
 29723                                  	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 29724                                  	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 29725                                  
 29726                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 29727                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 29728                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 29729                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 29730                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 29731                                  
 29732                                  bf10:	
 29733                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 29734                                  	jz	short bf30
 29735                                  
 29736                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 29737                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 29738                                  	jnz	short bf20
 29739                                  
 29740                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29741                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 29742                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 29743                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 29744                                  
 29745                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 29746                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 29747                                  	mov	cx,ax
 29748                                  
 29749                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 29750                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 29751                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 29752                                  
 29753                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 29754                                  	mov     ax,es
 29755                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 29756                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29757                                  	inc     ax
 29758                                  	mov     es,ax
 29759                                  
 29760                                  	jmp	short bf10
 29761                                  
 29762                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 29763                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 29764                                  	or	bx,bx
 29765                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 29766                                  bfE:	
 29767                                  	stc
 29768                                  bfX:
 29769                                  	pop	cx
 29770                                  	pop	bx
 29771                                  	retn
 29772                                  
 29773                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29774                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 29775                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29776                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 29777                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 29778                                  ; ERROR:    None
 29779                                  ; USES:     Flags
 29780                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29781                                  
 29782                                  isSpecified:
 29783                                  	push	ax
 29784                                  
 29785                                  	xor	bh,bh
 29786                                  	mov	bl,al
 29787                                  
 29788                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 29789                                  	;
 29790                                  	;push	ds
 29791                                  	;push	cs
 29792                                  	;pop	ds
 29793                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 29794                                  	;pop	ds
 29795                                  	
 29796                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 29797                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 29798                                  
 29799                                  	pop	ax
 29800                                  	retn
 29801                                  
 29802                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29803                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 29804                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29805                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 29806                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 29807                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 29808                                  ; USES:     Flags
 29809                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29810                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 29811                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 29812                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 29813                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 29814                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 29815                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29816                                  
 29817                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 29818                                  
 29819                                  shrinkMCB:
 29820                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 29821                                  	push	bx
 29822                                  	push	cx
 29823                                  	push	es
 29824                                  
 29825                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 29826                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 29827                                  
 29828                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29829                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 29830                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 29831                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 29832                                  	; 18/12/2022
 29833                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 29834                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 29835                                  
 29836                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 29837                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29838                                  
 29839                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 29840                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 29841                                  
 29842                                  	add	ax,bx
 29843                                  	inc	ax
 29844                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 29845                                  
 29846                                  	mov	ax,cx
 29847                                  	sub	ax,bx
 29848                                  	; 12/12/2022
 29849                                  	; ax > 0
 29850                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 29851                                  
 29852                                  	; 18/12/2022
 29853                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 29854                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 29855                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 29856                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 29857                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 29858                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 29859                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 29860                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 29861                                  
 29862                                  	; 18/12/2022
 29863                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 29864                                  
 29865                                  	; 12/12/2022
 29866                                  	; cf=0
 29867                                  	;clc
 29868                                  	; 18/12/2022
 29869                                  	;jmp	short smX
 29870                                  smE:	
 29871                                  	; 18/12/2022
 29872                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 29873                                  	;stc
 29874                                  smX:	
 29875                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 29876                                  	pop	es
 29877                                  	pop	cx
 29878                                  	pop	bx
 29879                                  	retn
 29880                                  
 29881                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29882                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 29883                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29884                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 29885                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 29886                                  ; ERROR:    None
 29887                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 29888                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29889                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 29890                                  ;
 29891                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 29892                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 29893                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 29894                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 29895                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 29896                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 29897                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 29898                                  ;       Endif
 29899                                  ;    Endif
 29900                                  ; Endif
 29901                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 29902                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 29903                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 29904                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 29905                                  ;    ENDIF
 29906                                  ; ENDIF
 29907                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29908                                  
 29909                                  _hideUMB_:
 29910                                  	push	bx
 29911                                  	push	dx
 29912                                  	push	es
 29913                                  
 29914                                  	mov	al,cl
 29915                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 29916                                  	jz	short hu_20
 29917                                  
 29918                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 29919                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 29920                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 29921                                  
 29922                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 29923                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 29924                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 29925                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 29926                                  
 29927                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 29928                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 29929                                  
 29930                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 29931                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 29932                                  
 29933                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 29934                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 29935                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 29936                                  hu_10:	
 29937                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 29938                                  	jz	short hu_20
 29939                                  
 29940                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 29941                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 29942                                  
 29943                                  	mov	dx,es
 29944                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 29945                                  
 29946                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 29947                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 29948                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 29949                                  
 29950                                  	xor	dx,dx
 29951                                  hu_30:	
 29952                                  	mov	al,cl
 29953                                  
 29954                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 29955                                  
 29956                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 29957                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 29958                                  
 29959                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 29960                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 29961                                  hu_X:	
 29962                                  	pop	es
 29963                                  	pop	dx
 29964                                  	pop	bx
 29965                                  	retn
 29966                                  
 29967                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29968                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 29969                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29970                                  ; Entry:  None
 29971                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 29972                                  ; Error:  None
 29973                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 29974                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29975                                  
 29976                                  UnFreeze:
 29977                                  	push	ax
 29978                                  	push	es
 29979                                  
 29980                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 29981                                  	jc	short ufX
 29982                                  
 29983                                  	mov	es,ax
 29984                                  
 29985                                  ; ------------------------------
 29986                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 29987                                  ; ------------------------------
 29988                                  
 29989                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 29990                                  	jnz	short uf20
 29991                                  	call	unHideMCB
 29992                                  uf20:	
 29993                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 29994                                  
 29995                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 29996                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 29997                                  
 29998                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 29999                                  	mov     ax,es
 30000                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30001                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30002                                  	inc     ax
 30003                                  	mov     es,ax
 30004                                  
 30005                                  	jmp	short uf10
 30006                                  ufX:	
 30007                                  	pop	es
 30008                                  	pop	ax
 30009                                  	retn
 30010                                  
 30011                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30012                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 30013                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30014                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30015                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 30016                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30017                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30018                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30019                                  
 30020                                  isFrozMCB:
 30021                                  	;push	ax
 30022                                  
 30023                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 30024                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30025                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 30026                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30027                                  
 30028                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 30029                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 30030                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30031                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30032                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30033                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 30034                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30035                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30036                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30037                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30038                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30039                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30040                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30041                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30042                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30043                                  ifmX:	
 30044                                  	;pop	ax
 30045                                  	retn
 30046                                  
 30047                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30048                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 30049                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30050                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30051                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 30052                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30053                                  ; USES:     None
 30054                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30055                                  
 30056                                  frezMCB:
 30057                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30058                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30059                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30060                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30061                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30062                                  	retn
 30063                                  
 30064                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30065                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 30066                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30067                                  ; Entry:  None
 30068                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 30069                                  ; Error:  None
 30070                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30071                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30072                                  
 30073                                  FreezeUM:
 30074                                  	push	ax
 30075                                  	push	cx
 30076                                  	push	dx
 30077                                  	push	es
 30078                                  
 30079                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 30080                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30081                                  
 30082                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30083                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 30084                                  
 30085                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30086                                  	mov	es,ax
 30087                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30088                                  
 30089                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30090                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 30091                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 30092                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 30093                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30094                                  
 30095                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30096                                  	jnz	short fum20
 30097                                  
 30098                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30099                                  fum20:	
 30100                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 30101                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 30102                                  
 30103                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 30104                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30105                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 30106                                  
 30107                                  	call	frezMCB
 30108                                  fum30:	
 30109                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30110                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30111                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30112                                  
 30113                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30114                                  	mov     ax,es
 30115                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30116                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30117                                  	inc     ax
 30118                                  	mov     es,ax
 30119                                  	
 30120                                  	jmp	short fum10
 30121                                  
 30122                                  fumX:	pop	es
 30123                                  	pop	dx
 30124                                  	pop	cx
 30125                                  	pop	ax
 30126                                  	retn
 30127                                  
 30128                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30129                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 30130                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30131                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30132                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 30133                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30134                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 30135                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30136                                  
 30137                                  UmbTest:
 30138                                  	push	ax
 30139                                  	push	bx
 30140                                  	push	ds
 30141                                  	push	es
 30142                                  
 30143                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 30144                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 30145                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 30146                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 30147                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 30148                                  
 30149                                  	pop	es
 30150                                  	pop	ds
 30151                                  	pop	bx
 30152                                  	pop	ax
 30153                                  	retn
 30154                                  
 30155                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30156                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 30157                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30158                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30159                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 30160                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30161                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30162                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30163                                  
 30164                                  WalkMem:
 30165                                  	push	ax ; ?
 30166                                  	push	bx ; ?
 30167                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 30168                                  		   	
 30169                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30170                                  	int	21h
 30171                                  
 30172                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 30173                                  	mov	es,ax
 30174                                  
 30175                                  ; ------------------------------
 30176                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 30177                                  ; ------------------------------
 30178                                  
 30179                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30180                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 30181                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 30182                                  
 30183                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 30184                                  
 30185                                  	mov     bx,es
 30186                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 30187                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30188                                  	inc     bx
 30189                                  	mov     es,bx
 30190                                  		
 30191                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 30192                                  um20:	
 30193                                  	mov	ax,es
 30194                                  
 30195                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 30196                                  
 30197                                  	pop	es ; ?
 30198                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 30199                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 30200                                  	retn
 30201                                  
 30202                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30203                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 30204                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30205                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30206                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30207                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30208                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30209                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30210                                  
 30211                                  hl_unlink:
 30212                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30213                                  
 30214                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 30215                                  	;
 30216                                  	;push	ds
 30217                                  	;push	cs
 30218                                  	;pop	ds
 30219                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 30220                                  	;pop	ds
 30221                                  
 30222                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 30223                                  
 30224                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30225                                  	int	21h
 30226                                  	retn
 30227                                  
 30228                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30229                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30230                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30231                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30232                                  
 30233                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 30234                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 30235                                  
 30236                                  ;   Modification log:
 30237                                  ;
 30238                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 30239                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 30240                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 30241                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 30242                                  
 30243                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 30244                                  
 30245                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30246                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 30247                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30248                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 30249                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 30250                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 30251                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30252                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 30253                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30254                                  
 30255                                  UnHideUMBs:
 30256                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 30257                                  
 30258                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30259                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 30260                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 30261                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 30262                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 30263                                  ;    every command execution.
 30264                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30265                                  
 30266                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 30267                                  	;
 30268                                  	;push	ds
 30269                                  	;push	cs
 30270                                  	;pop	ds
 30271                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 30272                                  	;pop	ds	
 30273                                  
 30274                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 30275                                  
 30276                                  	or	al,al
 30277                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 30278                                  
 30279                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 30280                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 30281                                  	retn			; that.
 30282                                  uhu10:	
 30283                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 30284                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 30285                                  
 30286                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 30287                                  	;
 30288                                  	;push	es
 30289                                  	;push	cs
 30290                                  	;pop	es
 30291                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 30292                                  	;pop	ds	
 30293                                  
 30294                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 30295                                  
 30296                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 30297                                  
 30298                                  	pop	ax
 30299                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30300                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 30301                                  	retn
 30302                                  
 30303                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30304                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 30305                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30306                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30307                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30308                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30309                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30310                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30311                                  
 30312                                  he_unlink:
 30313                                  	xor	bh, bh
 30314                                  
 30315                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 30316                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 30317                                  
 30318                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30319                                  	int	21h
 30320                                  	retn
 30321                                  
 30322                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30323                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 30324                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30325                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30326                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 30327                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 30328                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30329                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30330                                  
 30331                                  FreeUMBs:
 30332                                  	push	ax
 30333                                  	push	es
 30334                                  
 30335                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30336                                  	jc	short fusX
 30337                                  
 30338                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 30339                                  fus10:	
 30340                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30341                                  	jnz	short fus20
 30342                                  	call	freeMCB
 30343                                  fus20:	   
 30344                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30345                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30346                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 30347                                  
 30348                                  	mov	ax,es
 30349                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30350                                  	inc	ax
 30351                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30352                                  
 30353                                  	jmp	short fus10
 30354                                  fusX:	
 30355                                  	pop	es
 30356                                  	pop	ax
 30357                                  	retn
 30358                                  
 30359                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30360                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 30361                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30362                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30363                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 30364                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30365                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30366                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30367                                  
 30368                                  isHideMCB:
 30369                                  	;push	ax
 30370                                  
 30371                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 30372                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 30373                                  
 30374                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 30375                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 30376                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 30377                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30378                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30379                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 30380                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 30381                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30382                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30383                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30384                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30385                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30386                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30387                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30388                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30389                                  ihm_x:	
 30390                                  	;pop	ax
 30391                                  	retn
 30392                                  
 30393                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30394                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 30395                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30396                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30397                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 30398                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30399                                  ; USES:     AX
 30400                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30401                                  
 30402                                  freeMCB:
 30403                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30404                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 30405                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30406                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30407                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30408                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30409                                  	retn
 30410                                  
 30411                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30412                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 30413                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30414                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 30415                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 30416                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 30417                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30418                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30419                                  
 30420                                  HeadUmb:
 30421                                  	; 13/05/2019
 30422                                  
 30423                                  	;push	si ; ?
 30424                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 30425                                  	;push	es
 30426                                  	;push	bx ; *
 30427                                  
 30428                                  	; 09/04/2019
 30429                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 30430                                  
 30431                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30432                                  	int	21h
 30433                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 30434                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 30435                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 30436                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 30437                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30438                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 30439                                  
 30440                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 30441                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 30442                                  xhu_e:	
 30443                                  	;stc
 30444                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 30445                                  xhu_x:	
 30446                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 30447                                  	;pop	es	
 30448                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 30449                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 30450                                  	retn
 30451                                  
 30452                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30453                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 30454                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30455                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30456                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 30457                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30458                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 30459                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30460                                  
 30461                                  linkumb:
 30462                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 30463                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 30464                                  
 30465                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 30466                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 30467                                  
 30468                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30469                                  	mov	bx,1
 30470                                  	int	21h
 30471                                  lumbX:
 30472                                  	retn
 30473                                  
 30474                                  %endif
 30475                                  
 30476                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30477                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 30478                                  
 30479                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30480                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30481                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30482                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30483                                  
 30484                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30485                                  ;
 30486                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 30487                                  ;
 30488                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 30489                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 30490                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 30491                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 30492                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 30493                                  ;
 30494                                  ;	Output : none
 30495                                  ;
 30496                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 30497                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 30498                                  ;
 30499                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30500                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 30501                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 30502                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 30503                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 30504                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30505                                  
 30506                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30507                                  InitDevLoad:
 30508                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30509                                  	; ds = cs
 30510 00002818 803E[071F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 30511                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 30512                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 30513 0000281D 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 30514                                  
 30515                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30516                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 30517                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 30518                                  ;
 30519                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 30520                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 30521                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 30522                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 30523                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 30524                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 30525                                  ;
 30526                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 30527                                  ;
 30528                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 30529                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 30530                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 30531                                  ;	pushf
 30532                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 30533                                  ;	popf
 30534                                  ;
 30535                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 30536                                  ;
 30537                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 30538                                  
 30539                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30540                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 30541                                  InitForConv:
 30542                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30543                                  	; ds = cs
 30544 0000281F E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 30545                                  					;  current UMB ?
 30546 00002822 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 30547 00002824 E85004                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 30548 00002827 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 30549 0000282A 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 30550                                  					;  in low memory
 30551                                  InitForHi:
 30552                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30553                                  	; ds = cs
 30554                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 30555                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 30556                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 30557 0000282C A1[FD1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 30558 0000282F 8B16[F91E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 30559 00002833 0316[FB1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 30560 00002837 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 30561                                  
 30562                                  InitForLo:
 30563                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30564                                  	; ds = cs
 30565                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 30566 00002839 C606[071F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 30567                                  initforlo_x:
 30568                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30569                                  	; ds = cs
 30570                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 30571                                  					;  we are loading low
 30572                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 30573                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 30574 0000283E A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 30575 00002841 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 30576                                  idl1:
 30577 00002845 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 30578                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30579                                  	; ds = cs
 30580                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 30581                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 30582                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 30583                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 30584 00002848 A3[EC1E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 30585 0000284B 8916[EE1E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 30586 0000284F C706[F01E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 30587 00002855 A3[F21E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 30588 00002858 C3                      	retn
 30589                                  
 30590                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30591                                  ;
 30592                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 30593                                  ;
 30594                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 30595                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 30596                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 30597                                  ;		   current UMB
 30598                                  ;
 30599                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30600                                  
 30601                                  SpaceInUMB:
 30602                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30603                                  	; ds = cs
 30604                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 30605                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 30606                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 30607 00002859 A1[FB1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 30608 0000285C 0306[F91E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 30609 00002860 2B06[FD1E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 30610                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30611                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 30612                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
