 30613                                  	;stc
 30614                                  	;retn
 30615                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30616 00002864 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 30617 00002867 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 30618                                  spcinumb1:
 30619 00002869 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 30620                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30621                                  	; ds = cs
 30622 0000286A 3B06[EA1E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 30623                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 30624                                  spcinumb2:
 30625 0000286E C3                      	retn
 30626                                  
 30627                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30628                                  ;
 30629                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 30630                                  ;
 30631                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 30632                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 30633                                  ;
 30634                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30635                                  
 30636                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30637                                  ;
 30638                                  ;PrepareMark:
 30639                                  ;	push	ds
 30640                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 30641                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 30642                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 30643                                  ;	pop	ds
 30644                                  ;
 30645                                  ;	inc	ax
 30646                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 30647                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 30648                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 30649                                  ;	retn
 30650                                  
 30651                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30652                                  ;
 30653                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 30654                                  ;
 30655                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 30656                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 30657                                  ;		 the device.
 30658                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 30659                                  ;
 30660                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 30661                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 30662                                  ;	UMB.
 30663                                  ;
 30664                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 30665                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 30666                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 30667                                  ;
 30668                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30669                                  
 30670                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30671                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 30672                                  
 30673                                  GetUMBForDev:
 30674                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30675                                  	; ds = cs
 30676 0000286F BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 30677 00002872 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 30678 00002875 CD21                    	int	21h
 30679                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 30680                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 30681                                  
 30682 00002877 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 30683 00002879 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 30684                                  
 30685 0000287B 4B                      	dec	bx
 30686                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30687                                  	; ds = cs
 30688 0000287C 391E[EA1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 30689                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 30690 00002880 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 30691 00002882 43                      	inc	bx
 30692                                  
 30693 00002883 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 30694 00002886 CD21                    	int	21h
 30695 00002888 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 30696                                  
 30697                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30698                                  	;dec	ax
 30699                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 30700                                  	;
 30701                                  PrepareMark:
 30702 0000288A 1E                      	push	ds
 30703 0000288B 48                      	dec	ax
 30704 0000288C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 30705 0000288E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 30706 00002894 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 30707 0000289A 40                      	inc	ax
 30708 0000289B 1F                      	pop	ds
 30709                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30710                                  	; ds = cs
 30711                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 30712                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 30713                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 30714 0000289C 891E[FB1E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 30715 000028A0 A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 30716 000028A3 A3[FD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 30717                                  	;
 30718                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30719                                  	; cf=0
 30720                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 30721 000028A6 C3                      	retn
 30722                                  gufd_err:
 30723 000028A7 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 30724                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30725                                  	; ds = cs
 30726                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 30727                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 30728                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 30729 000028A9 A3[FB1E]                	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 30730 000028AC A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 30731 000028AF A3[FD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 30732 000028B2 F9                      	stc
 30733 000028B3 C3                      	retn

 30735                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30736                                  ;
 30737                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 30738                                  ;
 30739                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 30740                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 30741                                  ;
 30742                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 30743                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 30744                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 30745                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 30746                                  ;
 30747                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 30748                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 30749                                  ;
 30750                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30751                                  
 30752                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30753                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 30754                                  
 30755                                  DevSetMark:
 30756 000028B4 06                      	push	es
 30757 000028B5 57                      	push	di
 30758 000028B6 1E                      	push	ds
 30759 000028B7 56                      	push	si
 30760 000028B8 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 30761 000028BA 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 30762 000028C0 40                      	inc	ax
 30763 000028C1 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 30764                                  
 30765                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 30766                                  
 30767 000028C5 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 30768 000028C6 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 30769                                  
 30770 000028CB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 30771 000028CD FC                      	cld
 30772                                  dsm_again:
 30773 000028CE AC                      	lodsb
 30774 000028CF 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 30775 000028D1 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 30776 000028D3 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 30777 000028D5 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 30778                                  isit_slash:
 30779 000028D7 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 30780 000028D9 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 30781 000028DB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 30782 000028DD EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 30783                                  isit_null:
 30784 000028DF 08C0                    	or	al,al
 30785 000028E1 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 30786 000028E3 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 30787                                  
 30788 000028E5 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 30789 000028E8 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 30790                                  dsm_next_char:
 30791 000028EB AC                      	lodsb
 30792 000028EC 08C0                    	or	al, al
 30793 000028EE 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 30794 000028F0 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 30795 000028F2 7403                    	je	short blankout
 30796 000028F4 AA                      	stosb
 30797 000028F5 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 30798                                  blankout:
 30799 000028F7 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 30800 000028F9 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 30801 000028FB F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 30802                                  dsm_exit:
 30803 000028FD 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 30804 000028FE 5E                      	pop	si
 30805 000028FF 1F                      	pop	ds
 30806 00002900 5F                      	pop	di
 30807 00002901 07                      	pop	es
 30808 00002902 C3                      	retn

 30811                                  ;
 30812                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 30813                                  ;
 30814                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 30815                                  ;
 30816                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 30817                                  ;
 30818                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 30819                                  ;	in DevSize
 30820                                  ;
 30821                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30822                                  
 30823                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30824                                  SizeDevice:
 30825                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30826                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 30827 00002903 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 30828 00002904 06                      	push	es
 30829 00002905 1F                      	pop	ds
 30830 00002906 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 30831 00002908 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 30832 0000290B CD21                    	int	21h
 30833 0000290D 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 30834                                  
 30835 0000290F 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 30836 00002911 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 30837 00002914 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 30838 00002916 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 30839 00002918 CD21                    	int	21h
 30840 0000291A 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 30841 0000291C 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 30842 0000291F 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 30843 00002922 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 30844 00002926 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 30845 00002928 2EC706[EA1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 30846                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 30847 0000292F EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 30848                                  szdev1:
 30849 00002931 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 30850 00002933 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 30851 00002935 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 30852 00002937 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 30853 00002939 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 30854                                  	;
 30855                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30856 0000293B 2E3B06[081F]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 30857 00002940 7705                    	ja      short szdev2
 30858 00002942 2EA1[081F]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 30859                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30860 00002946 F8                      	clc
 30861                                  szdev2:
 30862 00002947 2EA3[EA1E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 30863                                  
 30864                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30865                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30866                                  	; cf=0
 30867                                  	;clc
 30868                                  sd_close:
 30869 0000294B 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 30870                                  					;  carry flag
 30871 0000294C B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 30872 0000294F CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 30873 00002951 9D                      	popf
 30874                                  sd_err:
 30875                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30876                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 30877 00002952 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 30878 00002953 C3                      	retn

 30883                                  ;

 30910                                  		; AL = subfunction

 31187                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31188                                  ;
 31189                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31190                                  ;
 31191                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31192                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31193                                  ;
 31194                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31195                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31196                                  ;
 31197                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31198                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31199                                  ;
 31200                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31201                                  
 31202                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31203                                  
 31204                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31205                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)

 31208 00002A3A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31209                                  ghn_next:

 31211 00002A3F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31212 00002A42 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31213 00002A44 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31214 00002A47 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31215 00002A49 50                      	push	ax
 31216 00002A4A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31217 00002A4C E83706                  	call	delim
 31218 00002A4F 58                      	pop	ax
 31219                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31220 00002A50 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31221 00002A53 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31222 00002A55 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31223                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31224                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31225 00002A58 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31226                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31227                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31228                                  ghn_shift1:
 31229 00002A5A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31230 00002A5C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31231 00002A5E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31232 00002A60 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31233 00002A62 46                      	inc	si
 31234 00002A63 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 31235                                  ghn_into_paras:

 31237 00002A68 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31238 00002A6B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 31239 00002A6F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err

 31458                                  					;    new block

 31551                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31552                                  ;
 31553                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 31554                                  ;
 31555                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 31556                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 31557                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 31558                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 31559                                  ;
 31560                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 31561                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 31562                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 31563                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 31564                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 31565                                  ;
 31566                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31567                                  
 31568                                  umb_coalesce:
 31569                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31570                                  	; ds = cs
 31571 00002BB5 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 31572                                  
 31573 00002BB6 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 31574                                  
 31575                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 31576                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31577 00002BB8 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 31578 00002BBC 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 31579                                  uc_nextfree:
 31580 00002BC1 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 31581 00002BC3 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31582                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 31583 00002BC5 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 31584 00002BCA 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 31585                                  					; N: get next arena
 31586 00002BCC E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 31587 00002BCF 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 31588 00002BD1 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 31589                                  uc_again:
 31590 00002BD3 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 31591 00002BD6 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 31592                                  uc_check:
 31593 00002BD8 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 31594 00002BDD 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 31595                                  					; Y: coalesce
 31596 00002BDF 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 31597 00002BE4 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 31598                                  	;add	[3],cx
 31599 00002BE5 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 31600 00002BE9 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 31601 00002BEC 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 31602 00002BEE EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 31603                                  
 31604                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31605                                  ;uc_done:
 31606                                  	;retn
 31607                                  
 31608                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31609                                  ;
 31610                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 31611                                  ;
 31612                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 31613                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 31614                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 31615                                  ;
 31616                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31617                                  
 31618                                  	; 01/11/2022
 31619                                  get_next:
 31620 00002BF0 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31621 00002BF5 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 31622                                  _get_next_:
 31623 00002BF7 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 31624 00002BF9 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 31625 00002BFD 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 31626 00002BFE 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31627                                  	;clc
 31628                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31629                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31630                                  	; cf=0
 31631                                  	;clc
 31632 00002C00 C3                      	retn
 31633                                  gn_err:
 31634 00002C01 F9                      	stc
 31635                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 31636                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 31637 00002C02 C3                      	retn

 31639                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31640                                  ;
 31641                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 31642                                  ;
 31643                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31644                                  
 31645                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31646                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 31647                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 31648                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31649                                  	; ds = cs

 31652

 31662

 31667

 31669 00002C17 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 31670                                  	
 31671 00002C19 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'

 31691                                  					;  data segment with the arena

 31733                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 31734                                  ;
 31735                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 31736                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool

 31740                                  ShrinkUMB:
 31741                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31742                                  	; ds = cs
 31743 00002C77 833E[F91E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 31744                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 31745 00002C7C 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 31746 00002C7E 06                      	push	es
 31747 00002C7F 53                      	push	bx
 31748                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31749                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 31750                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 31751                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 31752 00002C80 8B1E[FD1E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 31753 00002C84 2B1E[F91E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31754 00002C88 8E06[F91E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 31755                                  	
 31756 00002C8C B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 31757 00002C8F CD21                    	int	21h
 31758                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 31759                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 31760                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 31761 00002C91 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 31762 00002C93 48                      	dec	ax
 31763 00002C94 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31764 00002C96 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 31765 00002C9D 5B                      	pop	bx
 31766 00002C9E 07                      	pop	es

 31790 00002CAD 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 31791 00002CB2 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 31792                                  ulu_next:
 31793 00002CB7 E836FF                  	call	get_next
 31794 00002CBA 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 31795 00002CBC 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 31796 00002CBE 7404                    	je	short ulu_found

 31798 00002CC2 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next

 31807                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31808                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 31809                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31810                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31811                                  
 31812                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 31813                                  ;
 31814                                  ; Summary:
 31815                                  ;
 31816                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 31817                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 31818                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 31819                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 31820                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 31821                                  ;
 31822                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 31823                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 31824                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 31825                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 31826                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 31827                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 31828                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 31829                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 31830                                  ;
 31831                                  ; Example:
 31832                                  ;
 31833                                  ;   [menu]
 31834                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 31835                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 31836                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 31837                                  ;
 31838                                  ;   [network]
 31839                                  ;   include misc
 31840                                  ;   device=foo
 31841                                  ;
 31842                                  ;   [misc]
 31843                                  ;   device=bar
 31844                                  ;   include alternate
 31845                                  ;
 31846                                  ;   [alternate]
 31847                                  ;   device=tar
 31848                                  ;
 31849                                  ;
 31850                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 31851                                  ;
 31852                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 31853                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 31854                                  ;
 31855                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 31856                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 31857                                  ;   following order:
 31858                                  ;
 31859                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 31860                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 31861                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 31862                                  ;
 31863                                  
 31864                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 31865                                  
 31866                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 31867                                  
 31868                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 31869                                  
 31870                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 31871                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 31872                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 31873                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 31874                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 31875                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 31876                                  
 31877                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31878                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31879                                  
 31880                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 31881                                  
 31882                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31883                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 31884                                  
 31885 00002CCC 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 31994                                  
 31995                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31996                                  ;
 31997                                  ; procedure : parseline
 31998                                  ;
 31999                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32000                                  ;
 32001                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32002                                  
 32003                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32004                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32005                                  
 32006                                  parseline:
 32007                                  	push	ds
 32008                                  
 32009                                  	push	cs
 32010                                  	pop	ds
 32011                                  
 32012                                  nextswtch:
 32013                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32014                                  	je	short done_line
 32015                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32016                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32017                                  
 32018                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32019                                  
 32020                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32021                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32022                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 32023                                  	je	short getparm
 32024                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32025                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32026                                  
 32027                                  getparm:
 32028                                  	call	check_switch
 32029                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32030                                  	jc	short swterr
 32031                                  getnext:
 32032                                  	call	getchr
 32033                                  	jc	short done_line
 32034                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 32035                                  swterr:
 32036                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32037                                  
 32038                                  done_line:
 32039                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32040                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32041                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32042                                  	jnz	short okay
 32043                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32044                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32045                                  
 32046                                  okay:
 32047                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 32048                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32049                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32050                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32051                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32052                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32053                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32054                                  	; cf=0
 32055                                  	;clc
 32056                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 32057                                  exitpl:
 32058                                  	pop	ds
 32059                                  	retn
 32060                                  put_back:
 32061                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32062                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32063                                  	jmp	short done_line
 32064                                  
 32065                                  %endif
 32066                                  
 32067                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32068                                  ;
 32069                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32070                                  ;
 32071                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32072                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32073                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32074                                  ; error.
 32075                                  ;
 32076                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32077                                  
 32078                                  check_switch:
 32079 00002D22 E816FA                  	call	getchr
 32080                                  	;jc	short err_check
 32081 00002D25 724E                    	jc	short err_chk
 32082 00002D27 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 32083 00002D29 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 32084                                  	;jb	short err_check
 32085 00002D2B 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32086 00002D2D 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 32087 00002D2F 7743                    	ja	short err_check
 32088                                  
 32089 00002D31 06                      	push	es
 32090                                  
 32091 00002D32 0E                      	push	cs
 32092 00002D33 07                      	pop	es
 32093                                  
 32094 00002D34 8A0E[2C37]              	mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 32095 00002D38 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 32096 00002D3A BF[2D37]                	mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 32097 00002D3D F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32098                                  
 32099 00002D3F 07                      	pop	es
 32100 00002D40 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 32101                                  
 32102 00002D42 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 32103 00002D45 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 32104 00002D47 8B1E[9836]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 32105 00002D4B 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 32106 00002D4D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32107                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32108 00002D4F A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 32109                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 32110 00002D51 741E                    	jz	short done_swtch
 32111                                  
 32112 00002D53 E8E5F9                  	call	getchr
 32113 00002D56 721A                    	jc	short err_swtch
 32114                                  
 32115 00002D58 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32116 00002D5A 7516                    	jne	short err_swtch
 32117                                  
 32118 00002D5C E8DCF9                  	call	getchr
 32119 00002D5F 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 32120                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32121                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 32122                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32123                                  	; ds = cs
 32124 00002D60 C606[2A03]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 32125 00002D65 E8D803                  	call	getnum
 32126                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 32127                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32128 00002D68 C606[2A03]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 32129 00002D6D 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 32130                                  
 32131                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 32132                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 32133                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 32134                                  
 32135 00002D6E E80500                  	call	process_num
 32136                                  
 32137                                  done_swtch:
 32138                                  	;clc
 32139                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32140                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32141                                  	; cf=0
 32142                                  	;clc
 32143 00002D71 C3                      	retn
 32144                                  
 32145                                  err_swtch:
 32146 00002D72 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 32147                                  err_check:
 32148 00002D74 F9                      	stc
 32149                                  err_chk:
 32150 00002D75 C3                      	retn
 32151                                  
 32152                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32153                                  ;
 32154                                  ; procedure : process_num
 32155                                  ;
 32156                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 32157                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 32158                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 32159                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 32160                                  ;
 32161                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32162                                  
 32163                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32164                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 32165                                  process_num:
 32166 00002D76 850E[9836]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 32167 00002D7A 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 32168                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32169 00002D7C F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 32170                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 32171 00002D7F 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 32172 00002D81 A2[9736]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 32173                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32174                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32175                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32176                                  	; cf=0
 32177 00002D84 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32178                                  try_f:
 32179                                  	; 12/12/2022

 32239                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32240                                  ;
 32241                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32242                                  ;
 32243                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32244                                  
 32245                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32246                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32247                                  parseline:
 32248                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32249                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 32250                                  
 32251                                  	;push	ds ; *
 32252                                  
 32253                                  	;push	cs ; *
 32254                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 32255                                  
 32256                                  nextswtch:
 32257 00002DA8 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32258 00002DAA 741C                    	je	short done_line
 32259 00002DAC 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32260 00002DAE 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32261                                  
 32262                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32263                                  
 32264 00002DB0 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32265 00002DB2 760F                    	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32266 00002DB4 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'
 32267 00002DB6 7402                    	je	short getparm
 32268 00002DB8 F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32269                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32270                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32271                                  swterr:
 32272 00002DB9 C3                      	retn
 32273                                  
 32274                                  getparm:
 32275 00002DBA E865FF                  	call	check_switch
 32276 00002DBD 891E[9836]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32277 00002DC1 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 32278                                  getnext:
 32279 00002DC3 E875F9                  	call	getchr
 32280                                  	;jc	short done_line
 32281                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 32282                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32283 00002DC6 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 32284                                  ;swterr:
 32285                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32286                                  
 32287                                  done_line:
 32288                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32289 00002DC8 F606[9836]08            	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32290                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32291 00002DCD 750C                    	jnz	short okay
 32292 00002DCF F9                      	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32293                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32294                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32295 00002DD0 C3                      	retn
 32296                                  
 32297                                  ;exitpl:
 32298                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32299                                  	; ds = cs
 32300                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 32301                                  	;retn
 32302                                  
 32303                                  put_back:
 32304 00002DD1 FF06[D203]              	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32305 00002DD5 FF0E[D603]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32306 00002DD9 EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 32307                                  
 32308                                  okay:
 32309 00002DDB A1[9836]                	mov	ax,[switches]
 32310 00002DDE 83E003                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32311 00002DE1 A3[7135]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32312 00002DE4 C706[9535]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32313                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32314                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32315                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32316                                  	; cf=0
 32317                                  	;clc
 32318                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 32319                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32320                                  	;jmp	short setdeviceparameters
 32321

 32327                                  ;
 32328                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 32329                                  ;
 32330                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 32331                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 32332                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 32333                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 32334                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 32335                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 32336                                  ;
 32337                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 32338                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 32339                                  ;
 32340                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 32341                                  ;
 32342                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32343                                  
 32344                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32345                                  
 32346                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32347                                  setdeviceparameters:
 32348                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32349                                  	; ds = cs
 32350                                  	
 32351 00002DEA 06                      	push	es
 32352                                  
 32353 00002DEB 0E                      	push	cs
 32354 00002DEC 07                      	pop	es
 32355                                  
 32356 00002DED 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32357 00002DEF 8A1E[7035]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 32358 00002DF3 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 32359 00002DF6 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 32360                                  
 32361 00002DF8 C706[7335]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 32362                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 32363                                  got_80:
 32364 00002DFE D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 32365 00002E00 8BB7[1837]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 32366                                  
 32367                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 32368                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32369 00002E04 BF[7635]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 32370 00002E07 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 32371 00002E0A FC                      	cld
 32372                                  	;repe	movsb
 32373                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32374 00002E0B F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 32375                                  
 32376 00002E0D 07                      	pop	es
 32377                                  
 32378                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32379 00002E0E F606[9836]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 32380                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 32381 00002E13 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 32382                                  
 32383 00002E15 A1[9536]                	mov	ax,[slim]
 32384                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 32385 00002E18 A3[8335]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 32386                                  
 32387                                  see_heads:
 32388                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32389 00002E1B F606[9836]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 32390                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 32391 00002E20 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 32392                                  
 32393 00002E22 A1[9336]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 32394                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 32395 00002E25 A3[8535]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 32396                                  
 32397                                  heads_not_altered:
 32398                                  
 32399                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 32400                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 32401                                  
 32402                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 32403                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32404                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 32405                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32406 00002E28 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 32407 00002E2B A2[7835]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 32408                                  
 32409 00002E2E B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 32410                                  
 32411                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 32412                                  
 32413                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 32414                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32415 00002E30 8A3E[8035]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 32416                                  
 32417                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32418                                  	; ax = 2
 32419 00002E34 3906[8535]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 32420                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 32421 00002E38 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 32422                                  
 32423 00002E3A 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 32424                                  
 32425                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 32426                                  
 32427 00002E3C 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 32428                                  
 32429                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 32430                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 32431                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 32432                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 32433                                  
 32434                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 32435                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 32436                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 32437                                  
 32438 00002E3E 833E[8335]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 32439 00002E43 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 32440 00002E45 833E[7335]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 32441 00002E4A 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 32442                                  
 32443                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 32444                                  
 32445 00002E4C EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 32446                                  
 32447                                  ;	check for 320K
 32448                                  
 32449                                  not_144m:
 32450 00002E4E 833E[7335]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 32451 00002E53 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 32452 00002E55 833E[8335]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 32453 00002E5A 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 32454                                  
 32455 00002E5C B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 32456 00002E5E EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 32457                                  
 32458                                  only_one_head:
 32459                                  
 32460                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 32461                                  
 32462 00002E60 803E[7035]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 32463 00002E65 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 32464                                  
 32465                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 32466                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 32467                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 32468                                  
 32469 00002E67 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 32470 00002E69 833E[8335]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 32471                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32472 00002E6E 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 32473                                  
 32474 00002E70 B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 32475                                  
 32476                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 32477                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 32478                                  
 32479                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 32480                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32481                                  	; ax = 2
 32482 00002E72 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 32483 00002E73 A2[7835]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 32484                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 32485                                  
 32486                                  got_correct_mediad:
 32487 00002E76 881E[8035]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 32488                                  
 32489                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 32490                                  
 32491 00002E7A A1[7335]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 32492 00002E7D F726[8535]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 32493 00002E81 F726[8335]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 32494 00002E85 A3[7E35]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 32495 00002E88 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 32496                                  
 32497 00002E89 C3                      	retn
 32498                                  
 32499                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine
 32500

 32503                                  ; procedure : organize

 32517                                  ;ifndef	MULTI_CONFIG
 32518                                  ;

 32520                                  ;;   because we the case of values in SET commands preserved
 32521                                  ;
 32522                                  ;	call	mapcase
 32523                                  ;endif
 32524                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32525 00002E90 E81B02                  	call	mapcase

 32527 00002E93 31F6                    	xor	si,si

 32537                                  org1:
 32538 00002E9C E8B101                  	call	skip_comment
 32539 00002E9F 740D                    	jz	short end_commd_line	; found a comment string and skipped.
 32540 00002EA1 E89601                  	call	get2			; not a comment string. then get a char.
 32541 00002EA4 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf ; 0Ah
 32542 00002EA6 7406                    	je	short end_commd_line	; starts with a blank line.
 32543 00002EA8 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' ; 20h

 32545 00002EAC EB0A                    	jmp	short findit
 32546

 32549                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset the command level.

 32553 00002EB4 EBE6                    	jmp	short org1
 32554                                  
 32555                                  nochar1:
 32556 00002EB6 F9                      	stc
 32557 00002EB7 C3                      	retn
 32558                                  
 32559                                  findit:
 32560 00002EB8 51                      	push	cx
 32561 00002EB9 56                      	push	si
 32562 00002EBA 57                      	push	di
 32563 00002EBB 89F5                    	mov	bp,si
 32564 00002EBD 4D                      	dec	bp
 32565 00002EBE BE[DE34]                        mov     si,comtab		; prepare to search command table
 32566 00002EC1 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 32567                                  findcom:
 32568 00002EC3 89EF                    	mov	di,bp
 32569 00002EC5 8A0C                    	mov	cl,[si]
 32570 00002EC7 46                      	inc	si
 32571 00002EC8 E324                    	jcxz	nocom
 32572                                  
 32573                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32574                                  
 32575                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 32576                                  ;
 32577                                  ;;   Simplify future parsing by collapsing ";" onto "REM", and at the same
 32578                                  ;;   time skip the upcoming delimiter test (since ";" need not be followed by
 32579                                  ;;   anything in particular)
 32580                                  ;
 32581                                  ;       cmp     byte [es:di],CONFIG_SEMICOLON  ; ';'
 32582                                  ;       je	short semicolon
 32583                                  ;loopcom:
 32584                                  ;       mov     al,[es:di]
 32585                                  ;       inc     di
 32586                                  ;       and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; force upper case
 32587                                  ;       inc     si                      ; compare to byte @es:di
 32588                                  ;       cmp     al,[si-1]
 32589                                  ;       loope   loopcom
 32590                                  ;;else
 32591                                  ;;	repe	cmpsb
 32592                                  ;endif
 32593                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32594 00002ECA F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 32595                                  
 32596 00002ECC 9F                      	lahf
 32597 00002ECD 01CE                            add     si,cx                   ; bump to next position without affecting flags
 32598 00002ECF 9E                      	sahf
 32599 00002ED0 AC                              lodsb                           ; get indicator letter
 32600 00002ED1 75F0                    	jnz	short findcom
 32601 00002ED3 26803D0D                        cmp     byte [es:di],cr		; the next char might be cr,lf
 32602 00002ED7 7410                    	je	short gotcom0 		; such as in "rem",cr,lf case.
 32603 00002ED9 26803D0A                	cmp	byte [es:di],lf
 32604 00002EDD 740A                    	je	short gotcom0
 32605                                  
 32606                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32607                                  ;
 32608                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 32609                                  ;
 32610                                  ;;   Skip the delimiter test for the BEGIN identifier (it doesn't have one).
 32611                                  ;
 32612                                  ;       cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN  ; '['
 32613                                  ;       je	short gotcom0
 32614                                  ;;endif
 32615                                  ;	push	ax
 32616                                  ;       mov     al,[es:di]		; now the next char. should be a delim.
 32617                                  ;
 32618                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 32619                                  ;
 32620                                  ;;   If keyword is *immediately* followed by a question mark (?), then
 32621                                  ;;   set the high bit of the ASCII command code (CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY) that is
 32622                                  ;;   stored in the CONFIG.SYS memory image.
 32623                                  ;
 32624                                  ;       cmp     al,'?'                  ; explicit interactive command?
 32625                                  ;       jne	short no_query		; no
 32626                                  ;       pop     ax                      ; yes, so retrieve the original code
 32627                                  ;       or      al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ; and set the QUERY bit
 32628                                  ;       jmp     short gotcom0           ;
 32629                                  ;semicolon:

 32631                                  ;       jmp     short gotcom0
 32632                                  ;no_query:
 32633                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 32634                                  
 32635                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32636 00002EDF 50                      	push	ax
 32637 00002EE0 268A05                  	mov	al,[es:di]		; now the next char. should be a delim.
 32638                                  
 32639 00002EE3 E8A001                  	call	delim
 32640                                  no_delim:
 32641 00002EE6 58                      	pop	ax
 32642 00002EE7 75DA                    	jnz	short findcom
 32643                                  gotcom0:
 32644 00002EE9 5F                      	pop	di
 32645 00002EEA 5E                      	pop	si
 32646 00002EEB 59                      	pop	cx

 32970                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32971                                  ;
 32972                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 32973                                  ;
 32974                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 32975                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 32976                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 32977                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 32978                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 32979                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 32980                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 32981                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 32982                                  ;
 32983                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32984                                  
 32985                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32986                                  
 32987                                  skip_comment:
 32988 00003050 E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 32989                                  
 32990                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32991                                  	; ds = cs	
 32992                                  
 32993 00003052 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 32994                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 32995 00003057 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 32996                                  
 32997 00003059 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 32998                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 32999 0000305E 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 33000                                  
 33001 00003060 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33002                                  	
 33003 00003063 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 33004                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 33005 00003067 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 33006                                  
 33007 00003069 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 33008                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 33009 0000306E 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33010                                  
 33011 00003070 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 33012                                  	
 33013 00003074 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 33014                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33015 00003078 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 33016                                  skip_cmmt:
 33017 0000307A E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 33018 0000307C 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33019 0000307F 46                      	inc	si
 33020 00003080 49                      	dec	cx
 33021 00003081 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 33022 00003083 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33023                                  no_commt:
 33024 00003085 C3                      	retn
 33025                                  
 33026                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33027                                  %if 0
 33028                                  
 33029                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33030                                  
 33031                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33032                                  ;
 33033                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 33034                                  ;
 33035                                  ;   INPUT
 33036                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33037                                  ;
 33038                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33039                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 33040                                  ;
 33041                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33042                                  ;       All
 33043                                  ;
 33044                                  ;   HISTORY
 33045                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33046                                  ;
 33047                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33048                                  
 33049                                  kbd_read:
 33050                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 33051                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 33052                                  
 33053                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 33054                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 33055                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 33056                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 33057                                  kbd_loop:
 33058                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 33059                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 33060                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 33061                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33062                                          int     16h             ;
 33063                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33064                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 33065                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 33066                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 33067                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33068                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 33069                                  
 33070                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 33071                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 33072                                  kbd_loopdone:
 33073                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 33074                                  kbd_nodelay:
 33075                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 33076                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33077                                          int     16h             ;
 33078                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33079                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 33080                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 33081                                          inc     bx
 33082                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 33083                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 33084                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 33085                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 33086                                          int     16h             ;
 33087                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
