 33088                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 33089                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 33090                                  
 33091                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 33092                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 33093                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 33094                                  	
 33095                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 33096                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 33097                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 33098                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 33099                                          call    print
 33100                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 33101                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 33102                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 33103                                  kbd_notf5:
 33104                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 33105                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 33106                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 33107                                  
 33108                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 33109                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 33110                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 33111                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 33112                                          call    print           ;
 33113                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 33114                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 33115                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 33116                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 33117                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 33118                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 33119                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 33120                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 33121                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 33122                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 33123                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 33124                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 33125                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 33126                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 33127                                          retn			;
 33128                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 33129                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 33130                                          retn			;
 33131                                  
 33132                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33133                                  ;
 33134                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 33135                                  ;
 33136                                  ;   INPUT
 33137                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 33138                                  ;
 33139                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33140                                  ;       None
 33141                                  ;
 33142                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33143                                  ;       None
 33144                                  ;
 33145                                  ;   HISTORY
 33146                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33147                                  ;
 33148                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33149                                  
 33150                                  set_numlock:
 33151                                          push    ax
 33152                                          push    ds
 33153                                          sub     ax,ax
 33154                                          mov     ds,ax
 33155                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 33156                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 33157                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 33158                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 33159                                          jmp     short set_done
 33160                                  not_off:
 33161                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 33162                                          stc
 33163                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 33164                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 33165                                  set_done:
 33166                                          pop     ds
 33167                                          pop     ax
 33168                                          retn
 33169                                  
 33170                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33171                                  
 33172                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33173                                  ;
 33174                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 33175                                  ;
 33176                                  ;   INPUT
 33177                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 33178                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 33179                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33180                                  ;
 33181                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33182                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 33183                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 33184                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 33185                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 33186                                  ;
 33187                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33188                                  ;       All
 33189                                  ;
 33190                                  ;   NOTES
 33191                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 33192                                  ;
 33193                                  ;   HISTORY
 33194                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33195                                  ;
 33196                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33197                                  
 33198                                  menu_check:
 33199                                  
 33200                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 33201                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 33202                                  
 33203                                          push    cx              ;
 33204                                          push    si              ;
 33205                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 33206                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 33207                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33208                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 33209                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 33210                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 33211                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 33212                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33213                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 33214                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33215                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 33216                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 33217                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 33218                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 33219                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 33220                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33221                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 33222                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 33223                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 33224                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 33225                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 33226                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 33227                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 33228                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 33229                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 33230                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 33231                                          call    get_char        ;
 33232                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 33233                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 33234                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 33235                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33236                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33237                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 33238                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 33239                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 33240                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 33241                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33242                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 33243                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33244                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 33245                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 33246                                          pop     si              ;
 33247                                          pop     cx              ;
 33248                                  
 33249                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 33250                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 33251                                  
 33252                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33253                                          jnz	short menu_search
 33254                                  ;
 33255                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 33256                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 33257                                  ;
 33258                                          call    kbd_read
 33259                                          jnc	short menu_search
 33260                                          jmp	menu_abort
 33261                                  
 33262                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 33263                                  
 33264                                  menu_search:
 33265                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 33266                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 33267                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 33268                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 33269                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 33270                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 33271                                  
 33272                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 33273                                  
 33274                                  menu_color:
 33275                                          push    cx              ;
 33276                                          push    dx              ;
 33277                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 33278                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 33279                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 33280                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 33281                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 33282                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33283                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 33284                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 33285                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 33286                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 33287                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 33288                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 33289                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 33290                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 33291                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33292                                  check_color:                    ;
 33293                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 33294                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 33295                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 33296                                  set_color:
 33297                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 33298                                          pop     dx              ;
 33299                                          pop     cx              ;
 33300                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 33301                                  
 33302                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 33303                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 33304                                  
 33305                                  menu_found:
 33306                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 33307                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 33308                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 33309                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 33310                                  
 33311                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 33312                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 33313                                  
 33314                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 33315                                  
 33316                                  menu_process:
 33317                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33318                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 33319                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 33320                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 33321                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 33322                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 33323                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 33324                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 33325                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 33326                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 33327                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 33328                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 33329                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 33330                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33331                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 33332                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 33333                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33334                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 33335                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33336                                          stc                     ;
 33337                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 33338                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33339                                  menu_numlock:
 33340                                          call    set_numlock
 33341                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33342                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 33343                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 33344                                  
 33345                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 33346                                  
 33347                                  menu_default:
 33348                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 33349                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 33350                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 33351                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 33352                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 33353                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 33354                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 33355                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 33356                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 33357                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 33358                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 33359                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 33360                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 33361                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 33362                                  timeout_skip:
 33363                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33364                                  
 33365                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 33366                                  
 33367                                  menu_item:
 33368                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 33369                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 33370                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 33371                                          call    srch_block      ;
 33372                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 33373                                          stc                     ;
 33374                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 33375                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 33376                                  
 33377                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 33378                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 33379                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 33380                                  
 33381                                  menu_itemfound:
 33382                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 33383                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 33384                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 33385                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 33386                                  
 33387                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 33388                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 33389                                  ;   description...
 33390                                  
 33391                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 33392                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 33393                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 33394                                          call    skip_token      ;
 33395                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33396                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 33397                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33398                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 33399                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 33400                                  
 33401                                  menu_nextitem:
 33402                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33403                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 33404                                  
 33405                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 33406                                  
 33407                                  menu_getdefault:
 33408                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 33409                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 33410                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 33411                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 33412                                  menu_valid:
 33413                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 33414                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 33415                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 33416                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 33417                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 33418                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 33419                                  menu_chkdefault:
 33420                                          push    bx              ;
 33421                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 33422                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 33423                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 33424                                          push    ds              ;
 33425                                          push    es              ;
 33426                                          pop     ds              ;
 33427                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 33428                                          pop     ds              ;
 33429                                          pop     bx              ;
 33430                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 33431                                          inc     bx              ;
 33432                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 33433                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 33434                                  menu_nodefault:
 33435                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 33436                                  menu_setdefault:
 33437                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 33438                                  
 33439                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 33440                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 33441                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 33442                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 33443                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 33444                                  ;   with no timeout)
 33445                                  
 33446                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 33447                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 33448                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 33449                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 33450                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 33451                                  
 33452                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 33453                                  
 33454                                  menu_display:
 33455                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 33456                                          int     10h             ;
 33457                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 33458                                          int     10h             ;
 33459                                          push    es              ;
 33460                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 33461                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 33462                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 33463                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 33464                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 33465                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 33466                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 33467                                          int     10h             ;
 33468                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 33469                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 33470                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 33471                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 33472                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 33473                                  	dec     dl              ;
 33474                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 33475                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 33476                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 33477                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 33478                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 33479                                  menu_clear:
 33480                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 33481                                          pop     es              ;
 33482                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 33483                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 33484                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 33485                                  
 33486                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33487                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 33488                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 33489                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 33490                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 33491                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 33492                                          int     10h             ;
 33493                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 33494                                          call    print           ;
 33495                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 33496                                          int     10h             ;
 33497                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 33498                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 33499                                  
 33500                                  menu_nostatus:
 33501                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 33502                                  menu_disploop:
 33503                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 33504                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 33505                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 33506                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 33507                                  
 33508                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 33509                                  
 33510                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 33511                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 33512                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 33513                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 33514                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 33515                                          int     10h             ;
 33516                                  
 33517                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 33518                                          call    print           ;
 33519                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 33520                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 33521                                          call    print           ;
 33522                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 33523                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33524                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 33525                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 33526                                  
 33527                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 33528                                  
 33529                                  menu_autoselect:
 33530                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 33531                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 33532                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 33533                                  menu_abort:
 33534                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 33535                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 33536                                  
 33537                                  normal_boot:
 33538                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 33539                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 33540                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 33541                                          sub     si,si           ;
 33542                                          jmp     menu_search
 33543                                  
 33544                                  not_topmenu:
 33545                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 33546                                          jne	short not_submenu
 33547                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 33548                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 33549                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 33550                                          mov     si,di           ;
 33551                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 33552                                          jmp     menu_found
 33553                                  
 33554                                  not_submenu:
 33555                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 33556                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 33557                                  
 33558                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 33559                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 33560                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 33561                                  
 33562                                  no_selection:
 33563                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 33564                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 33565                                          sub     si,si           ;
 33566                                          push    ds              ;
 33567                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 33568                                          sub     di,di           ;
 33569                                  
 33570                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 33571                                  ;
 33572                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 33573                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 33574                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 33575                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 33576                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 33577                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 33578                                  ;
 33579                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 33580                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 33581                                  
 33582                                  copyblock_loop:
 33583                                          push    bx              ; save selected block name
 33584                                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 33585                                          pop     bx              ;
 33586                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 33587                                  
 33588                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons:  it hit eof or a new block
 33589                                  
 33590                                  copyblock_begin:
 33591                                          push    ax              ;
 33592                                          push    cx              ;
 33593                                          push    si              ;
 33594                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 33595                                          mov     di,szCommon
 33596                                          push    ds              ;
 33597                                          push    cs              ;
 33598                                          pop     ds              ;
 33599                                          call    comp_names      ;
 33600                                          pop     ds              ;
 33601                                          pop     di              ;
 33602                                          pop     si              ;
 33603                                          pop     cx              ;
 33604                                          pop     ax              ;
 33605                                          je	short copyblock_check
 33606                                          or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 33607                                          jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 33608                                          push    di              ;
 33609                                          mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 33610                                          push    ds              ;
 33611                                          push    es              ;
 33612                                          pop     ds              ;
 33613                                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 33614                                          pop     ds              ;
 33615                                          pop     di              ;
 33616                                  copyblock_check:
 33617                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 33618                                          jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 33619                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33620                                          jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 33621                                  
 33622                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 33623                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 33624                                          call    get_char        ;
 33625                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 33626                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 33627                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 33628                                          je	short copyblock_begin
 33629                                          jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 33630                                  ;
 33631                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 33632                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 33633                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 33634                                  ;
 33635                                  move_config:
 33636                                          mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 33637                                          push    cx              ;
 33638                                  ;
 33639                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 33640                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 33641                                  ;
 33642                                   	;mov	cx,7
 33643                                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 33644                                          mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 33645                                          inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 33646                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 33647                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 33648                                  copy_boot: 
 33649                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 33650                                          cs
 33651                                  	lodsb
 33652                                  	mov     [di],al         ;
 33653                                          inc     di              ;
 33654                                          loop    copy_boot       ;
 33655                                  
 33656                                          push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 33657                                          mov     cx,128-7        ; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 33658                                          mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 33659                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 33660                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 33661                                          push    cs              ;
 33662                                          pop     es              ;
 33663                                          mov     si,szCommon
 33664                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 33665                                          call    any_delim       ;
 33666                                          je	short l2	;
 33667                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 33668                                          inc     si              ;
 33669                                          inc     di              ;
 33670                                          loop    l1              ;
 33671                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 33672                                          pop     es              ;
 33673                                  
 33674                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 33675                                  
 33676                                          sub     di,di           ;
 33677                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 33678                                          sub     si,si           ;
 33679                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 33680                                  
 33681                                          push    cx              ;
 33682                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 33683                                          pop     cx              ;
 33684                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 33685                                          pop     ds              ;
 33686                                  
 33687                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 33688                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 33689                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 33690                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 33691                                  ;   is empty.
 33692                                  
 33693                                          push    es              ;
 33694                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 33695                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 33696                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 33697                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 33698                                          pop     es
 33699                                  
 33700                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 33701                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 33702                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 33703                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 33704                                  
 33705                                  menu_done:
 33706                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 33707                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 33708                                          push    es              ;
 33709                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 33710                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 33711                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 33712                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 33713                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 33714                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 33715                                          pop     es              ;
 33716                                  menu_exit:
 33717                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 33718                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 33719                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 33720                                          retn
 33721                                  
 33722                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33723                                  ;
 33724                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 33725                                  ;
 33726                                  ;   INPUT
 33727                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 33728                                  ;
 33729                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33730                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 33731                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 33732                                  ;
 33733                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33734                                  ;       None
 33735                                  ;
 33736                                  ;   NOTES
 33737                                  ;       None
 33738                                  ;
 33739                                  ;   HISTORY
 33740                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33741                                  ;
 33742                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33743                                  
 33744                                  copy_envvar:
 33745                                          push    cx              ;
 33746                                          push    si              ;
 33747                                          push    ds              ;
 33748                                          push    es              ;
 33749                                          push    es              ;
 33750                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 33751                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 33752                                  
 33753                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 33754                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 33755                                  ;   config.sys line)
 33756                                  ;
 33757                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 33758                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 33759                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 33760                                  
 33761                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 33762                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 33763                                          lodsb                   ;
 33764                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 33765                                          stc                     ;
 33766                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 33767                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 33768                                          stc                     ;
 33769                                          je	short copy_envexit
 33770                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 33771                                          stc                     ;
 33772                                          je	short copy_envexit
 33773                                          inc     cx              ;
 33774                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 33775                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 33776                                          mov     al,0            ;
 33777                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 33778                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 33779                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 33780                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 33781                                  copy_varsrch:
 33782                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 33783                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 33784                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 33785                                          push    cx              ;
 33786                                          push    si              ;
 33787                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 33788                                          pop     si              ;
 33789                                          pop     cx              ;
 33790                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 33791                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 33792                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 33793                                  
 33794                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 33795                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 33796                                  
 33797                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 33798                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 33799                                          push    si              ;
 33800                                          mov     si,di           ;
 33801                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 33802                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 33803                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 33804                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 33805                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 33806                                  
 33807                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 33808                                  	es	; 26h
 33809                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 33810                                  
 33811                                  	pop     si
 33812                                  copy_envprep:
 33813                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 33814                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 33815                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 33816                                          je	short copy_envdel
 33817                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 33818                                  
 33819                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 33820                                          push    cx              ;
 33821                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 33822                                          repne   scasb           ;
 33823                                          pop     cx              ;
 33824                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 33825                                  
 33826                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 33827                                          lodsb                   ;
 33828                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 33829                                          je	short copy_envdone
 33830                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 33831                                          je	short copy_envdone
 33832                                          stosb                   ;
 33833                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 33834                                  
 33835                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 33836                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 33837                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 33838                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 33839                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 33840                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 33841                                  
 33842                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 33843                                          pop     es              ;
 33844                                          pop     ds              ;
 33845                                          pop     si              ;
 33846                                          pop     cx              ;
 33847                                  
 33848                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 33849                                          retn
 33850                                  
 33851                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33852                                  ;
 33853                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 33854                                  ;
 33855                                  ;   INPUT
 33856                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 33857                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 33858                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 33859                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 33860                                  ;
 33861                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33862                                  ;       Same as above
 33863                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 33864                                  ;
 33865                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33866                                  ;       All
 33867                                  ;
 33868                                  ;   NOTES
 33869                                  ;       None
 33870                                  ;
 33871                                  ;   HISTORY
 33872                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33873                                  ;
 33874                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33875                                  
 33876                                  copy_block:
 33877                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 33878                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 33879                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 33880                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 33881                                          je	short copy_done ;
 33882                                  
 33883                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 33884                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 33885                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 33886                                  
 33887                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 33888                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 33889                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 33890                                  
 33891                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 33892                                          push    di              ;
 33893                                  
 33894                                          mov     di,szMenu
 33895                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 33896                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 33897                                  
 33898                                          mov     di,szCommon
 33899                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 33900                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 33901                                  
 33902                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 33903                                          call    srch_block      ;
 33904                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 33905                                          pop     di              ;
 33906                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 33907                                          push    cx              ;
 33908                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 33909                                          push    si              ;
 33910                                          dec     dx              ;
 33911                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 33912                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 33913                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 33914                                          pop     si              ;
 33915                                          pop     cx              ;
 33916                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 33917                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 33918                                  
 33919                                  copy_skip:
 33920                                          pop     di
 33921                                  copy_error:
 33922                                          clc                     ;
 33923                                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 33924                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 33925                                  
 33926                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 33927                                  
 33928                                  copy_line:
 33929                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 33930                                          inc     di              ;
 33931                                          cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 33932                                          jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 33933                                          cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 33934                                          je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 33935                                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 33936                                          mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 33937                                          inc     di              ;
 33938                                          inc     di              ;
 33939                                          jmp     short copy_next ;
 33940                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 33941                                          call    get_char        ;
 33942                                          jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 33943                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 33944                                          inc     di              ;
 33945                                  copy_next:
 33946                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 33947                                          jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 33948                                  
 33949                                  copy_nextline:
 33950                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33951                                          jmp     short copy_block
 33952                                  
 33953                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33954                                  ;copy_done:
 33955                                          ;retn
 33956                                  
 33957                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33958                                  ;
 33959                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 33960                                  ;
 33961                                  ;   INPUT
 33962                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 33963                                  ;
 33964                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33965                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 33966                                  ;
 33967                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33968                                  ;       DX
 33969                                  ;
 33970                                  ;   NOTES
 33971                                  ;       None
 33972                                  ;
 33973                                  ;   HISTORY
 33974                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33975                                  ;
 33976                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33977                                  
 33978                                  get_linenum:
 33979                                          push    ax              ;
 33980                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 33981                                          push    cx              ;
 33982                                          mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 33983                                          push    si              ;
 33984                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 33985                                          sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 33986                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 33987                                          call    skip_line       ;
 33988                                          jc	short get_linenum_done
 33989                                          inc     bx              ;
 33990                                          cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 33991                                          jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 33992                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 33993                                          pop     si              ;
 33994                                          pop     cx              ;
 33995                                          pop     ax              ;
 33996                                          retn
 33997                                  
 33998                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33999                                  ;
 34000                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 34001                                  ;
 34002                                  ;   INPUT
 34003                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 34004                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 34005                                  ;
 34006                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34007                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 34008                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 34009                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 34010                                  ;
 34011                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34012                                  ;       None
 34013                                  ;
 34014                                  ;   NOTES
 34015                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 34016                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 34017                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 34018                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 34019                                  ;
 34020                                  ;   HISTORY
 34021                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34022                                  ;
 34023                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34024                                  
 34025                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 34026                                          push    ax              ;
 34027                                          push    cx              ;
 34028                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34029                                          push    si              ;
 34030                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34031                                          push    ds              ;
 34032                                          push    es              ;
 34033                                          pop     ds              ;
 34034                                          call    find_block      ;
 34035                                          mov     di,si           ;
 34036                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 34037                                          pop     ds              ;
 34038                                          pop     si              ;
 34039                                          pop     cx              ;
 34040                                          pop     ax              ;
 34041                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 34042                                          retn			;
 34043                                  
 34044                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34045                                  ;
 34046                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 34047                                  ;
 34048                                  ;   INPUT
 34049                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 34050                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 34051                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 34052                                  ;
 34053                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34054                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 34055                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34056                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34057                                  ;
 34058                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34059                                  ;       AX
 34060                                  ;
 34061                                  ;   NOTES
 34062                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 34063                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 34064                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 34065                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 34066                                  ;
 34067                                  ;   HISTORY
 34068                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34069                                  ;
 34070                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34071                                  
 34072                                  find_block:
 34073                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 34074                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 34075                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 34076                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 34077                                          je	short check_line ; no
 34078                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 34079                                          jne	short next_line	;
 34080                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34081                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 34082                                  check_line:
 34083                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34084                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 34085                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 34086                                  next_line:
 34087                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 34088                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
 34089                                  ;find_exit:
 34090                                  ;	retn
 34091                                  
 34092                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34093                                  ;
 34094                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 34095                                  ;
 34096                                  ;   INPUT
 34097                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 34098                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34099                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34100                                  ;
 34101                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34102                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 34103                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34104                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34105                                  ;
 34106                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34107                                  ;       AX
 34108                                  ;
 34109                                  ;   NOTES
 34110                                  ;       None
 34111                                  ;
 34112                                  ;   HISTORY
 34113                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34114                                  ;
 34115                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34116                                  
 34117                                  comp_names:
 34118                                          push    di              ;
 34119                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 34120                                          call    get_char        ;
 34121                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 34122                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 34123                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 34124                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 34125                                          inc     di              ;
 34126                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh
