 34127                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 34128                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 34129                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 34130                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 34131                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 34132                                          pop     di              ;
 34133                                          retn			;
 34134                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 34135                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 34136                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 34137                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 34138                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 34139                                  
 34140                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34141                                  
 34142                                  comp_names_safe:
 34143                                          push    ax
 34144                                          push    cx
 34145                                          push	si
 34146                                          push    ds
 34147                                          push    cs
 34148                                          pop     ds
 34149                                          call    comp_names
 34150                                          pop     ds
 34151                                  	pop	si
 34152                                          pop     cx
 34153                                          pop     ax
 34154                                          retn
 34155                                  
 34156                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34157                                  ;
 34158                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 34159                                  ;
 34160                                  ;   INPUT
 34161                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 34162                                  ;
 34163                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34164                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 34165                                  ;
 34166                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34167                                  ;       None
 34168                                  ;
 34169                                  ;   NOTES
 34170                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 34171                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 34172                                  ;
 34173                                  ;   HISTORY
 34174                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34175                                  ;
 34176                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34177                                  
 34178                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 34179                                          push    ax              ;
 34180                                          push    bx              ;
 34181                                          push    cx              ;
 34182                                          push    dx              ;
 34183                                          push    si              ;
 34184                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34185                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 34186                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 34187                                          push    dx              ; save it
 34188                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34189                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 34190                                          add     dh,3            ;
 34191                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 34192                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 34193                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34194                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 34195                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 34196                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 34197                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 34198                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 34199                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 34200                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34201                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 34202                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 34203                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 34204                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34205                                  print_other:                    ;
 34206                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 34207                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34208                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 34209                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 34210                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 34211                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 34212                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 34213                                          int     10h             ;
 34214                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34215                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34216                                          int     10h             ;
 34217                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 34218                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 34219                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 34220                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34221                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34222                                          int     10h             ;
 34223                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 34224                                          mov	ax,0920h
 34225                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 34226                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34227                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34228                                          int     10h             ;
 34229                                          push    es              ;
 34230                                  print_loop:                     ;
 34231                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 34232                                          inc     di              ;
 34233                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 34234                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 34235                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 34236                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 34237                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 34238                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 34239                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 34240                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 34241                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 34242                                          int     10h             ;
 34243                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34244                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 34245                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 34246                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34247                                          int     10h             ;
 34248                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 34249                                  print_done:                     ;
 34250                                          pop     es              ;
 34251                                          pop     dx              ;
 34252                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34253                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 34254                                          pop     si              ;
 34255                                          pop     dx              ;
 34256                                          pop     cx              ;
 34257                                          pop     bx              ;
 34258                                          pop     ax              ;
 34259                                          retn			;
 34260                                  
 34261                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34262                                  ;
 34263                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 34264                                  ;
 34265                                  ;   INPUT
 34266                                  ;       None
 34267                                  ;
 34268                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34269                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 34270                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 34271                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 34272                                  ;
 34273                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34274                                  ;       None
 34275                                  ;
 34276                                  ;   NOTES
 34277                                  ;       None
 34278                                  ;
 34279                                  ;   HISTORY
 34280                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34281                                  ;
 34282                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34283                                  
 34284                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 34285                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 34286                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34287                                          call    disp_num        ;
 34288                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 34289                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34290                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 34291                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 34292                                          int     21h             ;
 34293                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 34294                                  check_time:
 34295                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 34296                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 34297                                          jae	short show_time	;
 34298                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 34299                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 34300                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 34301                                  show_time:
 34302                                          push    bx              ;
 34303                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 34304                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34305                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34306                                          int     10h             ;
 34307                                          push    dx              ;
 34308                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 34309                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34310                                          int     10h             ;
 34311                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 34312                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 34313                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 34314                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 34315                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 34316                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 34317                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 34318                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 34319                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 34320                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 34321                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 34322                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 34323                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 34324                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 34325                                          pop     dx
 34326                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 34327                                          int     10h             ;
 34328                                          pop     bx              ;
 34329                                  input_key:
 34330                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 34331                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 34332                                          int     21h             ;
 34333                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 34334                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 34335                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 34336                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 34337                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 34338                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 34339                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 34340                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 34341                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 34342                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 34343                                  got_time:
 34344                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 34345                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 34346                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 34347                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 34348                                  got_key:
 34349                                          push    ax              ;
 34350                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 34351                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 34352                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 34353                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 34354                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 34355                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 34356                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 34357                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 34358                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 34359                                          pop     bx   		;
 34360                                  
 34361                                  timeout_disabled:
 34362                                          pop     ax              ;
 34363                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 34364                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 34365                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 34366                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 34367                                  
 34368                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 34369                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 34370                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 34371                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 34372                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 34373                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 34374                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 34375                                          jmp     short print1
 34376                                  not_up:
 34377                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 34378                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 34379                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 34380                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 34381                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 34382                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 34383                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 34384                                  print1: 
 34385                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 34386                                  print2: 
 34387                                  	call    print_item      ;
 34388                                          call    disp_num        ;
 34389                                  to_input_key:
 34390                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 34391                                  not_down:
 34392                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34393                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 34394                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 34395                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 34396                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 34397                                          call    show_status     ;
 34398                                          jmp     input_key	;
 34399                                  not_f8:
 34400                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 34401                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 34402                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 34403                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 34404                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 34405                                  
 34406                                  normal_key:
 34407                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 34408                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 34409                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 34410                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 34411                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 34412                                          retn			;
 34413                                  not_backspace:
 34414                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 34415                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 34416                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 34417                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 34418                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 34419                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 34420                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 34421                                          jmp	short print2
 34422                                  
 34423                                  select_done:
 34424                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 34425                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34426                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 34427                                  
 34428                                  	; fall into disp_input
 34429                                  
 34430                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34431                                  
 34432                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34433                                  ;
 34434                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 34435                                  ;
 34436                                  ;   INPUT
 34437                                  ;       AL == character to display
 34438                                  ;
 34439                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34440                                  ;       None
 34441                                  ;
 34442                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34443                                  ;       None
 34444                                  ;
 34445                                  ;   NOTES
 34446                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 34447                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 34448                                  ;
 34449                                  ;   HISTORY
 34450                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34451                                  ;
 34452                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34453                                  
 34454                                  disp_input:
 34455                                          push    ax
 34456                                          cmp     al,' '
 34457                                          jae	short disp_ok
 34458                                          mov     al,' '
 34459                                  disp_ok:
 34460                                          mov     dl,al
 34461                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 34462                                          int     21h
 34463                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 34464                                          call    print
 34465                                          pop     ax
 34466                                          retn
 34467                                  
 34468                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34469                                  
 34470                                  disp_num:
 34471                                          push    bx
 34472                                          add     al,'0'
 34473                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 34474                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 34475                                          mov     cx,1
 34476                                          int     10h
 34477                                          pop     bx
 34478                                          retn
 34479                                  
 34480                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34481                                  ;
 34482                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 34483                                  ;
 34484                                  ;   INPUT
 34485                                  ;       None
 34486                                  ;
 34487                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34488                                  ;       None
 34489                                  ;
 34490                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34491                                  ;       None
 34492                                  ;
 34493                                  ;   NOTES
 34494                                  ;       None
 34495                                  ;
 34496                                  ;   HISTORY
 34497                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34498                                  ;
 34499                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34500                                  
 34501                                  show_status:
 34502                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 34503                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 34504                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34505                                          int     10h             ;
 34506                                          push    dx              ; save it
 34507                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34508                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 34509                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34510                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 34511                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 34512                                          int     10h             ;
 34513                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 34514                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 34515                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 34516                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 34517                                  show_onoff: 
 34518                                          int     10h
 34519                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 34520                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 34521                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 34522                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 34523                                  
 34524                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 34525                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 34526                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 34527                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 34528                                  show_noton:                     ;
 34529                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 34530                                          int     10h             ;
 34531                                  show_done:                      ;
 34532                                          pop     dx              ;
 34533                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34534                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 34535                                          pop     bx              ;
 34536                                          retn			;
 34537                                  
 34538                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34539                                  
 34540                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34541                                  ;
 34542                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 34543                                  ;
 34544                                  ;   INPUT
 34545                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34546                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34547                                  ;
 34548                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34549                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 34550                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 34551                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 34552                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34553                                  ;
 34554                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34555                                  ;       AX
 34556                                  ;
 34557                                  ;   NOTES
 34558                                  ;       None
 34559                                  ;
 34560                                  ;   HISTORY
 34561                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34562                                  ;
 34563                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34564                                  
 34565                                  skip_token:
 34566                                          call    get_char
 34567                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 34568                                          call    any_delim
 34569                                          jne	short skip_token
 34570                                  skip_check_eol:
 34571                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 34572                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 34573                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 34574                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 34575                                          clc
 34576                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 34577                                  	retn
 34578                                  skip_token_eol:
 34579                                          stc
 34580                                  skip_token_done:
 34581                                          retn
 34582                                  
 34583                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34584                                  ;
 34585                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 34586                                  ;
 34587                                  ;   INPUT
 34588                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34589                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34590                                  ;
 34591                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34592                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 34593                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 34594                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 34595                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34596                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 34597                                  ;
 34598                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34599                                  ;       AX
 34600                                  ;
 34601                                  ;   NOTES
 34602                                  ;       None
 34603                                  ;
 34604                                  ;   HISTORY
 34605                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34606                                  ;
 34607                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34608                                  
 34609                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 34610                                          call    get_char        ;
 34611                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 34612                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 34613                                          call    delim           ;
 34614                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 34615                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 34616                                  
 34617                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34618                                  ;
 34619                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 34620                                  ;
 34621                                  ;   INPUT
 34622                                  ;       AL == last character read
 34623                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34624                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34625                                  ;
 34626                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34627                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 34628                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 34629                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 34630                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34631                                  ;
 34632                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34633                                  ;       AX
 34634                                  ;
 34635                                  ;   NOTES
 34636                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 34637                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 34638                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 34639                                  ;
 34640                                  ;   HISTORY
 34641                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34642                                  ;
 34643                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34644                                  
 34645                                  skip_opt_line:
 34646                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 34647                                          je	short skip_line_done
 34648                                       
 34649                                  	; fall into skip_line
 34650                                  
 34651                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34652                                  ;
 34653                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 34654                                  ;
 34655                                  ;   INPUT
 34656                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34657                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34658                                  ;
 34659                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34660                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 34661                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 34662                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34663                                  ;
 34664                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34665                                  ;       AX
 34666                                  ;
 34667                                  ;   NOTES
 34668                                  ;       None
 34669                                  ;
 34670                                  ;   HISTORY
 34671                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34672                                  ;
 34673                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34674                                  
 34675                                  skip_line:
 34676                                          call    get_char
 34677                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 34678                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 34679                                          jne	short skip_line
 34680                                  skip_line_done:
 34681                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34682                                          retn
 34683                                  
 34684                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34685                                  ;
 34686                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 34687                                  ;
 34688                                  ;   INPUT
 34689                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34690                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34691                                  ;
 34692                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34693                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 34694                                  ;       BX == binary #
 34695                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 34696                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34697                                  ;
 34698                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34699                                  ;       AX
 34700                                  ;
 34701                                  ;   NOTES
 34702                                  ;       None
 34703                                  ;
 34704                                  ;   HISTORY
 34705                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34706                                  ;
 34707                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34708                                  
 34709                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34710                                  
 34711                                  get_number:
 34712                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 34713                                  num_loop:
 34714                                          call    get_char        ;
 34715                                          jc	short num_done	;
 34716                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 34717                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 34718                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 34719                                          ja	short num_done	;
 34720                                          push    ax              ;
 34721                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 34722                                          push    dx              ;
 34723                                          mul     bx              ;
 34724                                          pop     dx              ;
 34725                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 34726                                          pop     ax              ;
 34727                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 34728                                          cbw                     ;
 34729                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 34730                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 34731                                  
 34732                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34733                                  ;num_done:
 34734                                          ;retn
 34735                                  
 34736                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34737                                  ;
 34738                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 34739                                  ;
 34740                                  ;   INPUT
 34741                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34742                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34743                                  ;
 34744                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34745                                  ;       AL == next character
 34746                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 34747                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34748                                  ;
 34749                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34750                                  ;       AX
 34751                                  ;
 34752                                  ;   NOTES
 34753                                  ;       None
 34754                                  ;
 34755                                  ;   HISTORY
 34756                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34757                                  ;
 34758                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34759                                  
 34760                                  get_char:
 34761                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 34762                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 34763                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 34764                                  	es	
 34765                                  	lodsb
 34766                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 34767                                          retn			;
 34768                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 34769                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 34770                                  nearby_ret:
 34771                                          retn
 34772                                  
 34773                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34774                                  ;
 34775                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 34776                                  ;
 34777                                  ;   INPUT
 34778                                  ;       AL == current command code
 34779                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 34780                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 34781                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 34782                                  ;
 34783                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34784                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 34785                                  ;
 34786                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34787                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 34788                                  ;
 34789                                  ;   NOTES
 34790                                  ;       None
 34791                                  ;
 34792                                  ;   HISTORY
 34793                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34794                                  ;
 34795                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34796                                  
 34797                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34798                                  query_user:
 34799                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 34800                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 34801                                          ; 12/12/2022
 34802                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 34803                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 34804                                  qu_1:
 34805                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 34806                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 34807                                          push    ax                      ;
 34808                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 34809                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 34810                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 34811                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 34812                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 34813                                          ; 12/12/2022
 34814                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 34815                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 34816                                  query_all:
 34817                                  
 34818                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 34819                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 34820                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 34821                                  
 34822                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 34823                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 34824                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34825                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 34826                                  
 34827                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 34828                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 34829                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 34830                                  find_match:                             ;
 34831                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 34832                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 34833                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 34834                                          inc     di                      ;
 34835                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 34836                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 34837                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 34838                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 34839                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 34840                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 34841                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 34842                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 34843                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 34844                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 34845                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 34846                                          inc     di                      ;
 34847                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 34848                                          int     21h                     ;
 34849                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 34850                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 34851                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 34852                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 34853                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 34854                                  cmd_notset:
 34855                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 34856                                  line_print:                             ;
 34857                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 34858                                          es
 34859                                  	lodsb
 34860                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 34861                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 34862                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 34863                                  non_null:                               ;
 34864                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 34865                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 34866                                          jne	short non_space		;
 34867                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 34868                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 34869                                  non_space:                              ;
 34870                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 34871                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 34872                                          int     21h                     ;
 34873                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 34874                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 34875                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 34876                                  
 34877                                  generic_prompt:
 34878                                          call    print                   ;
 34879                                  input_loop:                             ;
 34880                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 34881                                          int     16h                     ;
 34882                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 34883                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 34884                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 34885                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 34886                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 34887                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 34888                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 34889                                  not_func:
 34890                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 34891                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 34892                                          je	short legal_char	;
 34893                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 34894                                          je	short legal_char	;
 34895                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 34896                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 34897                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 34898                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 34899                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 34900                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 34901                                  legal_char:                             ;
 34902                                          call    disp_input              ;
 34903                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 34904                                  
 34905                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 34906                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 34907                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34908                                  	clc
 34909                                  do_cmd:
 34910                                  	pop     ax			;
 34911                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34912                                  	; cf=0
 34913                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 34914                                  	retn
 34915                                  
 34916                                  skip_cmd:
 34917                                  	pop     ax			;
 34918                                  skip_all:
 34919                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 34920                                  	stc
 34921                                  	retn
 34922                                  
 34923                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34924                                  ;
 34925                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 34926                                  ;
 34927                                  ;   INPUT
 34928                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 34929                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 34930                                  ;
 34931                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34932                                  ;       None
 34933                                  ;
 34934                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34935                                  ;       None
 34936                                  ;
 34937                                  ;   NOTES
 34938                                  ;       None
 34939                                  ;
 34940                                  ;   HISTORY
 34941                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34942                                  ;
 34943                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34944                                  
 34945                                  print_error:
 34946                                          push    ax
 34947                                          push    bx
 34948                                          push    cx
 34949                                          push    dx
 34950                                          push    ds
 34951                                          push    cs
 34952                                          pop     ds
 34953                                          pushf
 34954                                          call    get_linenum
 34955                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 34956                                          call    error_line
 34957                                          popf
 34958                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 34959                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 34960                                          call    print
 34961                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 34962                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 34963                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 34964                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 34965                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 34966                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 34967                                  pe_1:     
 34968                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 34969                                          call    print
 34970                                  pe_ret: 
 34971                                  	pop     ds
 34972                                          pop     dx
 34973                                          pop     cx
 34974                                          pop     bx
 34975                                          pop     ax
 34976                                  	retn
 34977                                  
 34978                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34979                                  
 34980                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 34981                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 34982                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 34983                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 34984                                  
 34985                                  disable_autoexec:
 34986                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 34987                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34988                                  
 34989                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 34990                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 34991                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 34992                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 34993                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 34994                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 34995                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 34996                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 34997                                  dae_1:
 34998                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 34999                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35000                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35001                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35002                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35003                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35004                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35005                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35006                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35007                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35008                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35009                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35010                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35011                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35012                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35013                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35014                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35015                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35016                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35017                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35018                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35019                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35020                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35021                                          retn
 35022                                  
 35023                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35024                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35025                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35026                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35027                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35028                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35029                                  	mov     dx,' Y'
 35030                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35031                                  
 35032                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35033                                  
 35034                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35035                                  
 35036                                  
 35037                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 35040                                  ;
 35041                                  ; procedure : delim
 35042                                  ;
 35043                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35044                                  
 35045                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35046                                  ;
 35047                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35048                                  ;
 35049                                  ;any_delim:
 35050                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35051                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35052                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35053                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35054                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35055                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35056                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35057                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35058                                  ;
 35059                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35060                                  
 35061                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35062                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35063                                  delim:
 35064 00003086 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35065 00003088 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35066                                  
 35067 0000308A 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35068 0000308C 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35069                                  
 35070                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35071 0000308E 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35072 00003090 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35073 00003092 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35074 00003094 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35075 00003096 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35076 00003098 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35077 0000309A 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35078 0000309C 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35079 0000309E 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35080                                  
 35081                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35082                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35083                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35084                                  ;	clc
 35085                                  ;;endif
 35086                                  
 35087                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35088                                  delim_ret:
 35089 000030A0 C3                      	retn
 35090

 35100 000030A1 E897F6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters

 35103 000030A8 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 35104 000030AA E88EF6                  	call	getchr
 35105                                  nl_ret:
 35106 000030AD C3                      	retn

 35110                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35111                                  ;
 35112                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35113                                  
 35114                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35115                                  mapcase:
 35116 000030AE 51                      	push	cx
 35117 000030AF 56                      	push	si
 35118 000030B0 1E                      	push	ds
 35119                                  
 35120 000030B1 06                      	push	es
 35121 000030B2 1F                      	pop	ds
 35122                                  
 35123                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35124                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35125                                  ;
 35126                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35127                                  ;;else
 35128                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35129                                  ;;endif
 35130                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35131 000030B3 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35132                                  
 35133                                  convloop:
 35134 000030B5 AC                      	lodsb
 35135 000030B6 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35136 000030B8 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35137 000030BA 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35138 000030BC 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35139 000030BE 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35140 000030C0 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35141                                  noconv:
 35142                                  
 35143                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35144                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35145                                  ;;
 35146                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35147                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35148                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35149                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35150                                  ;;
 35151                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35152                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35153                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35154                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35155                                  ;check_eol:
 35156                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35157                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35158                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35159                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35160                                  ;;endif
 35161                                  	
 35162                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35163 000030C3 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35164                                  convdone:
 35165 000030C5 1F                      	pop	ds
 35166 000030C6 5E                      	pop	si
 35167 000030C7 59                      	pop	cx
 35168 000030C8 C3                      	retn
 35169                                  
 35170                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35171                                  ;
 35172                                  ; procedure : round
 35173                                  ;
 35174                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35175                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35176                                  ;
 35177                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35178                                  
 35179                                  round:
 35180 000030C9 50                      	push	ax
 35181 000030CA 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35182                                  
 35183 000030CE E8F0DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35184                                  
 35185 000030D1 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35186 000030D6 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 35187 000030DD 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 35188 000030E1 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 35189 000030E6 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 35190 000030E8 2EF606[3614]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 35191 000030EE 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 35192 000030F0 06                      	push	es
 35193 000030F1 56                      	push	si
 35194 000030F2 2E8B36[3414]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 35195 000030F7 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 35196 000030F9 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 35197 000030FB 48                      	dec	ax
 35198                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 35199 000030FC 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 35200 00003100 2E8026[3614]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 35201 00003106 5E                      	pop	si
 35202 00003107 07                      	pop	es
 35203                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 35204 00003108 58                      	pop	ax
 35205                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35206                                  	; cf = 0
 35207                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35208                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 35209 00003109 C3                      	retn
 35210

 35255                                  	;cmp	al,9
 35256                                  	;ja	short notdig
 35257                                  	;clc
