 35267                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35268                                  ;
 35269                                  ; procedure : getnum
 35270                                  ;
 35271                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 35272                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 35273                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 35274                                  ;
 35275                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35276                                  
 35277                                  getnum:
 35278 00003140 53                      	push	bx
 35279 00003141 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 35280                                  b2:
 35281 00003143 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 35282 00003146 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 35283                                  
 35284 00003148 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 35285 00003149 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 35286                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 35287                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35288 0000314A B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 35289 0000314C F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 35290 0000314E 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 35291 0000314F 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 35292 00003151 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 35293 00003154 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 35294                                  
 35295 00003156 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 35296                                  
 35297 00003157 E8E1F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 35298 0000315A 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 35299 0000315C 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 35300 0000315E 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 35301 00003160 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 35302 00003162 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 35303 00003164 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 35304 00003166 7417                    	je	short b15
 35305 00003168 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 35306 0000316D 7410                    	je	short b15
 35307 0000316F 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 35308                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 35309                                  	;nop
 35310                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35311                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35312                                  	;nop
 35313                                  	;nop
 35314 00003171 740C                    	je	short b15
 35315 00003173 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 35316 00003175 7408                    	je	short b15
 35317 00003177 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35318 00003179 7404                    	je	short b15
 35319 0000317B 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 35320 0000317D 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 35321                                  b15:
 35322 0000317F 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 35323 00003184 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 35324                                  b1:
 35325 00003189 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 35326 0000318B 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 35327 0000318D 5B                      	pop	bx
 35328 0000318E C3                      	retn
 35329                                  badnum:
 35330                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35331                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35332 0000318F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 35333                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 35334 00003191 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 35335 00003195 5B                      	pop	bx
 35336 00003196 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 35337 00003197 C3                      	retn
 35338                                  
 35339                                  ;****************************************************************************
 35340                                  
 35341                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 35342                                  
 35343                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35344                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 35345                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 35346                                  ;	si = 0
 35347                                  ;	ax = country id
 35348                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 35349                                  ;	bx = file handle
 35350                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 35351                                  ;
 35352                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 35353                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 35354                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 35355                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 35356                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35357                                  
 35358 00003198 57                      	push	di
 35359 00003199 50                      	push	ax
 35360 0000319A 52                      	push	dx
 35361                                  
 35362 0000319B 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 35363 0000319D 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 35364 0000319F B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 35365 000031A2 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 35366 000031A5 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35367                                  
 35368 000031A7 06                      	push	es
 35369 000031A8 56                      	push	si
 35370                                  
 35371 000031A9 0E                      	push	cs
 35372 000031AA 07                      	pop	es
 35373                                  
 35374 000031AB BF[5434]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 35375 000031AE B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 35376 000031B1 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 35377                                  
 35378 000031B3 5E                      	pop	si
 35379 000031B4 07                      	pop	es
 35380 000031B5 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 35381                                  
 35382 000031B7 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 35383 000031BA 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 35384 000031BD 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 35385                                  
 35386 000031BF 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 35387 000031C0 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 35388 000031C2 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 35389 000031C5 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 35390 000031C8 E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 35391 000031CB 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35392                                  
 35393 000031CD 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 35394 000031CF 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 35395 000031D3 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 35396                                  
 35397 000031D5 46                      	inc	si
 35398 000031D6 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 35399 000031D7 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 35400 000031D8 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 35401 000031D9 5F                      	pop	di
 35402                                  
 35403                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 35404 000031DA 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 35405 000031DD 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 35406                                  
 35407 000031DF 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 35408 000031E2 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 35409 000031E4 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 35410 000031E7 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 35411                                  
 35412                                  setdoscntry_next:
 35413 000031E9 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 35414 000031EB 46                      	inc	si
 35415 000031EC 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 35416 000031ED E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find

 35573                                  getcountrydestination:
 35574                                  
 35575                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 35576                                  ;input: al - data id
 35577                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 35578                                  ;on return:
 35579                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 35580                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 35581

 35583                                  	;add	di,74
 35584 000032C7 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 35585                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.

 35587 000032CD 47                      	inc	di

 35623                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 35624                                  
 35625                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 35626                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 35627                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 35628                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 35629                                  ;	 be moved.
 35630                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 35631                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 35632                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 35633                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 35634                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 35635                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 35636                                  
 35637 000032F4 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 35638 000032F5 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 35639 000032F8 F9                      	stc
 35640 000032F9 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 35641 000032FB 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 35642 000032FC 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 35643                                  
 35644 000032FE 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 35645 00003300 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 35646 00003302 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 35647 00003304 F9                      	stc
 35648 00003305 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 35649                                  ricb_exit:
 35650 00003307 C3                      	retn

 35654                                  set_country_path:
 35655                                  
 35656                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 35657                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 35658                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 35659                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 35660                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 35661                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 35662                                  
 35663 00003308 56                      	push	si
 35664                                  
 35665 00003309 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 35666 0000330A 06                      	push	es
 35667 0000330B 1F                      	pop	ds

 35669

 35675 00003315 46                      	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"

 35678                                  scp_default_drv:
 35679 00003318 B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 35680 0000331A CD21                    	int	21h
 35681 0000331C 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 35682                                  
 35683                                  scp_setdrv:
 35684 0000331E 2EA2[1134]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 35685 00003322 BF[1434]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 35686 00003325 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 35687 00003327 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 35688 00003329 7406                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 35689                                  
 35690 0000332B 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 35691 0000332D 7402                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 35692                                  
 35693 0000332F EB01                    	jmp	short scp_path
 35694                                  
 35695                                  scp_root_dir:
 35696 00003331 4F                      	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 35697                                  scp_path:
 35698 00003332 E81F00                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 35699                                  
 35700 00003335 BF[1134]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 35701                                  scpath_exit:
 35702                                  
 35703 00003338 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 35704 00003339 06                      	push	es
 35705 0000333A 1F                      	pop	ds
 35706 0000333B 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 35707                                  
 35708 0000333C 5E                      	pop	si
 35709 0000333D C3                      	retn

 35713                                  chk_drive_letter:
 35714                                  
 35715                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 35716                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 35717                                  ;carry set if not.
